---
title: "Soviet Missiles in Cuba"
---

The US has stood their military down,
allowing the USSR to place nuclear missiles in Cuba.
Khrushchev scores a diplomatic victory and nuclear war is averted!

* President Kennedy Player: Add a payoff of 8 to your total payoff.

* Premier Khrushchev player: Add a payoff of 10 to your total payoff.

Record your strategies and payoffs.

  * Khrushchev player may optionally reveal their hidden type.

  * Discuss each of your strategies in the game.
  Make sure you get your classmate's actual name.

  * If necessary, update your priors and/or revise your plan of action.

  * Then find a new opponent and play the game again.
